example_en: At its worst, bullying is a kind of torture
Why Kids Don't Hand in Homework
Because he was late for school three times, the student was kept in after-school detention
He cheated on the test; he kept looking at my paper every time the teacher turned her back.
I can't expect her to be on time if I'm late myself
Nurses have to wear a uniform
Finally I persuaded her to write a few lines
Her warning shout came too late
Some boys make up to their teachers to get good marks
